column2: You want to convert a province, making your religious head happy and showing your piety to the world. Your stewardship will be reduced by two as you're busy helping your court chaplain convert the heathens.
column6: Deseas convertir una provincia, haciendo feliz al líder de tu fe y mostrando tu piedad al mundo. Tu habilidad administrativa se reduce a la mitad, pues estás muy ocupado ayudando a tu capellán a convertir a los paganos.

column2: [This.GetTitledFirstName] is already well-off, but seeks a true fortune.
column6: [This.GetTitledFirstName] ya tiene dinero, pero busca tener una fortuna.

column2: [This.GetTitledFirstName] wants to swim in [This.GetPossPronoun] vault of gold!
column6: ¡[This.GetTitledFirstName] quiere poder nadar en sus monedas de oro!

column2: [This.GetTitledFirstName] wants to be known to all as a pious [This.GetManWoman].
column6: [This.GetTitledFirstName] quiere que todos le conozcan por su piedad.

column2: [This.GetTitledFirstName] seeks to become known for [This.GetPossPronoun] virtues.
column6: [This.GetTitledFirstName] quiere que todos le conozcan por sus virtudes.

column2: [This.GetTitledFirstName] seeks to become distinguished among the nobility.
column6: [This.GetTitledFirstName] quiere poder destacar de entre los demás nobles.

column2: While already notable, [This.GetTitledFirstName] thinks [This.GetSheHe] deserves true fame and glory for [This.GetHerHis] deeds.
column6: Aunque ya es alguien importante, [This.GetTitledFirstName] piensa que merece alcanzar auténtica fama y gloria por sus hazañas.
